column2: an A.M. Eatery////Although it appeared smaller than expected on the inside there was more than enough space. Atmosphere was relaxed. A nice to place to go to for a quick brunch with friends or family. It gave off an upscale diner vibe. I ordered 2 sunny side up eggs
column5: and eggs Benedict: Habanero pork belly and salmon
column6: and mimosas. I would recommend those 2 choices if you ever plan on visiting. Overall
column7: my favorite part of this meal was the habanero pork belly eggs Benedict and sweet potato pancake. Service was good
